SEARCH
Package controller.manager.helper

Class ManagerManageRegistration

java.lang.Object
controller.manager.helper.ManagerManageRegistration
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManagerManageRegistration
public class ManagerManageRegistration extends Object implements IManagerManageRegistration
Provides functionality for managers to view and manage officer registration requests. Managers can approve or reject pending registrations for projects they handle.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ManagerManageRegistration(RegistrationList registrationList)
    Constructs a manager registration handler using the global registration list.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerManageRegistration

      public ManagerManageRegistration(RegistrationList registrationList)
      Constructs a manager registration handler using the global registration list.
      Parameters:
      registrationList - the list of all officer registration requests

  • Method Details

    • viewRegistration

      public void viewRegistration()
      Displays all registrations in the system, regardless of project. Intended to give managers full visibility into current and past officer registrations.
      Specified by:
      viewRegistration in interface IManagerManageRegistration

    • manageRegistration

      public void manageRegistration(Project project)
      Allows the manager to review and process pending officer registrations for a specific project. If officer slots are full, the registration is automatically rejected.
      Specified by:
      manageRegistration in interface IManagerManageRegistration
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which registrations are being managed
